inline_video.description: set this to 'true' to force iOS webview to play video inline rather than launch a widget.  video element in the HTML document must also include the webkit-playsinline attribute.

autoplay_video.description: set this to true to require user interaction before playing media

enable_html5_audio.title: Enable HTML5 Audio
enable_html5_audio.description: set this to 'true' to enable HTML5 <audio> tag playback in the iOS webview.

enable_background_audio.title: Enable Background Audio
enable_background_audio.description: set this to true to allow audio in the iOS webview to play even when the app is running in the background.

accept_cookies.description: set this to 'true' to set the application's webview policy to accept cookies
